pageProduct.name: U By Kotex Ultrathins Pads Regular 14 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

With U By Kotex® Ultrathin pads, you can get on with doing the things you love, without giving too much thought to your period. The Rapid-Dry Core and unique 3-layer design will keep you feeling dry and comfortable, plus they are ultra thin and flexible so you'll feel like you're wearing nothing at all!

  • Unique 5 in 1 protection
  • With a Rapid-Dry Core that draws moisture away for faster absorption
  • With grooves that channel moisture into the centre of the pad, giving you even more protection from leaks
  • Soft cover with unique 3-layer design for ultimate protection
  • Fits securely with sticky back to keep the pad firmly in place
  • Ultrathin, flexible and no wings so you feel like your wearing nothing at all
  • Perfect for medium flow days during your period!

U by Kotex® Ultrathins with a unique 3D Rapid-Dry Core .

Suitable For: Normal flow days

Boxed Contents: 14 Regular Non-Wing Ultrathin Pads

Size: 14 Pack

Fragrance: None

Scent: None
